name: A Glitch in a Cave
description:
This game is a top down roguelike-ish-thing shooter. You control a man with a sword, who has to make his way through a cave to kill the glitch, and some zombois on the way. Make your way to a ledge and then jump off! You got this!

Link to awesome track made by Serge Leblanc for the jam - https://soundcloud.com/s-erge/cave-adventure

Controlls: 

Movement - w a s d

Jump (when specified) - space

Shoot - left mouse click

Aim - move mouse

Restart - r

Quit - escape
